name: GF Custom Style
author: Alefy Pimentel Ferreira

sections.description: Do you want a simple and quick way to style your site’s forms? If you use gravity form plugin, gf-custom-style is the best option for you to customize your form. Simple grid options and easy to create your design.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gf-custom-style directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Apparence->GF Custom Style screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gf-custom-style directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Apparence->GF Custom Style screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Customize your gravity forms on WordPress with a flat design and colors of your choice.
description: Do you want a simple and quick way to style your site’s forms? If you use gravity form plugin, gf-custom-style is the best option for you to customize your form. Simple grid options and easy to create your design.
